attributes.action: The Noble Citizen's Award To Harry Fear for Services to True and brave Journalism.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the creation of the Noble Citizen's award to  whom, with their tenacity and bravery, make an outstanding contribution to services in the field of Journalism in times of crisis, delivering honest, truthful accounts of the situation from the place where news are generated in real time,and  where the misery and anguish of local people are the concern of the public opinion.Using social media networks as a platform for news of what is actually happening at the time of reporting,we believe this technology has revolutionised the way we see the world. Many have felt they are part of the process.Harry Fear has shown a remarkable example of integrity and bravery in his field by reporting day and night, using conventional social media networks and video links to keep the public engaged with honest and reliable news of the events in Gaza  this November 2012.
We nominate him for this, as true witnesses of is courage. We were there, We saw it, we heard it.
